content.headline: processing hierarchy
content.content: jstl-if > jstl-data > jstl-include > jstl-choose > jstl-foreach > jstl-add-attribute > text replacements > attribute value replacements

content.headline: jstl-autorun
content.content: With "jstl-autorun" start the JSTL direct after page load. Its simalar to:

With "jstl-if" you can determinate to render or not render an tag element. If the expression determinated to not render, it will stops all other processing steps and removed the element with all childs from dom tree.

content.headline: jstl-if sample
content.content: <[any tag] jstl-if="true|false|${variable|javascript}"></[any tag]>
As value of the "jstl-if" attribute you can use the Strings "true" or "false", an variable name from the data context or execute any javascript expression. The result should always be a boolean.
With "jstl-data" you can manipulate the data context. You can add static values or objects, manipulate exsisting values or you can run a html request to get json.

content.headline: jstl-if sample
content.content: <[any tag] jstl-data="[object|string|expression]" jstl-data-mode="[direct|remote|url-parameter]" jstl-data-var="[a variable name]" jstl-data-options="[ajax request options]"></[any tag]>

content.headline: "jstl-data" - Attribute (requiered)
content:
At content of this attribute, you can define a json object, evaluate an variable, run a javascript expression or use a static string. All this ways can be combined with evaluating a variable or execute an javascript.
The condition for the expression is, that the result must be a string or an object.
If you use a static string, it is posible to comibe it with the "jstl-data-mode" attribute.

content.subcontent: If you want to run a request, you must add "jstl-data-mode='remote'", to get url parameter you must add "jstl-data-mode='url-parameter'". Also, you can full combine dynamic expression with static content.

content.headline: "jstl-data-mode" - Attribute (optional - default value "direct")
content: - "direct"	-> this is the default value and means that the expression be evaluated and add to the data context.
- "remote"	-> this value means that the value of the "jstl-data" expression results in a ajax call to get json data.
- "url-parameter"	-> this value means that the value of the "jstl-data" expression used to evaluate a value as url parameter.

content.headline: "jstl-data-var" - Attribute (optional)
content.content: The value of this attribute must be a static string. With the static string you define a new variable at your data context. If the "jstl-data-var" not availible or ist the value empty, the evaluated data would be merged into data context and can override existing values. Be carrful!

content.headline: "jstl-data-options" - Attribute (optional)
content.content: The value must be an object. This object would be merged with the ajax request object from jquery. You are able to change all default values, without "success" and "error". Be carrful if you use this feature!
This attribute indicate the feature to load a new teamplate file by a html request. The content of this request would be include as child of the current element and would be processed by JSTL.

content.headline: jstl-include sample
content.content: <[any tag] jstl-include="[string|expression]" jstl-include-mode="[append|prepend|replace]" jstl-include-options="[ajax request options]"></[any tag]>

content.headline: "jstl-include" - Attribute (required)
content.content: The value must be a url string. You can use a static url string, an expression or you can combine static string with an expression.

content.headline: "jstl-include-mode" - Attribute (optional - default value "replace")
content: - "append"	-> append the content of the template as a child.
- "prepend"	-> prepend the content of the template as a child.
- "replace"	-> replaced all child with the content from the template.

content.headline: "jstl-include-options" - Attribute (optional)
content.content: The value must be an object. This object would be merged with the ajax request object from jquery. You are able to change all default values, without "success" and "error". Be carrful if you use this feature!
"jstl-choose" is aquivalent to "if - else if - else" or "switch" construction in javascript or other programming languages. The "jstl-choose" attribute is an marker attribute and don't need a value.

content.headline: jstl-choose sample
content.subcontent: Is an element marked with "jstl-choose", then there childs are evaluated to which child be rendered. All other childs would be removed!

content.headline: jstl-when - required
content.content: "jstl-when" is aquivalent ti "jstl-if". It the same functionality! As value of the "jstl-when" attribute you can use the Strings "true" or "false", an variable name from the data context or execute any javascript expression. The result should always be a boolean. It is possible to define multible child elements with the "jstl-when" attribute. The first element with "jstl-when" result "true" will be rendered. All other elements are removed!

content.headline: jstl-otherwise - optional
content.content: "jstl-otherwise" is optional and defines the default case. Is not an "jstl-when" case evaluated to true, "jstl-otherwise" will be rendered. Only once time, "jstl-otherwise" can be defined at "jstl-choose"!
"jstl-foreach" is the feature to loop over an array or over the properties of an object.

content.headline: jstl-foreach - required
content.content: "jstl-foreach" the value of this attribute must be an epression and it is required that the expression evaluate an arry, an object or a undefined!

content.headline: jstl-foreach-var - option (default is "itemVar")
content.content: With "jstl-foreach-var" you can define your running variable! This is fully optional but helpful to get an better anderstanding of your template at a later time.

content.headline: jstl-foreach-status - option (default is "statusVar")
content.content: With "jstl-foreach-status" you can define your running variable for the iteration context! This is fully optional but helpful to get an better anderstanding of your template at a later time.
